data.lyric:
[ti:One Big Country Song]
[ar:Locash]
[al:Brothers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.12]One Big Country Song - Locash
[00:16.42]Yeah life is like a jukebox just push play
[00:19.60]Not everybody's first verse sounds the same
[00:22.30]But we all get born and we all get raised
[00:25.28]Whether it's some boondocks or marina del rey
[00:28.11]Everybody turns wild when you're sixteen
[00:30.99]Slow roll big timin' on main street
[00:33.78]Everybody's got holes in their blue jeans
[00:36.90]If you bought 'em that way or not
[00:39.44]Turn it up and sing along
[00:42.36]We all work till the daylight's gone
[00:45.43]We all knock off the edge around five
[00:48.29]Fall in love from a kiss on Friday night
[00:51.46]And we've all had a broken heart
[00:54.04]We've all closed down a few good bars
[00:57.02]Take a look around y'all tell me I'm wrong
[01:00.13]Ain't the whole wide world just one big country song
[01:07.64]Just one big country song
[01:14.28]Yeah well who gon' try to find some water
[01:16.44]When it's hot when it's hot
[01:17.66]Whether it's a pontoon tube or a yacht yeah
[01:20.63]Who ain't got a dog that
[01:21.70]They love like a brother I do
[01:23.37]And who ain't ever tasted better
[01:24.74]Cookin' than their mother not me
[01:26.59]Who ain't got a story to tell
[01:29.62]And who ain't made it through some hell
[01:32.50]Who don't love somebody don't miss somebody
[01:35.47]If you're down sing it with somebody
[01:38.06]Turn it up and sing along
[01:40.84]We all work till the daylight's gone
[01:43.93]We all knock off the edge around five
[01:46.77]Fall in love from a kiss on Friday night
[01:50.07]And we've all had a broken heart
[01:52.54]We've all closed down a few good bars
[01:55.52]Take a look around y'all tell me I'm wrong
[01:58.81]Ain't the whole wide world just one big country song
[02:05.58]Yeah it's just one big country song
[02:13.57]Not everybody knows the words to mama tried
[02:19.32]A city boy country boy yeah we all just tryna survive
[02:23.67]So raise 'em high
[02:24.83]Turn it up and sing along
[02:27.76]We all work till the daylight's gone
[02:30.73]We all knock off the edge around five
[02:33.60]Fall in love from a kiss on Friday night
[02:36.80]And we've all had a broken heart
[02:39.36]We've all closed down a few good bars
[02:42.30]Take a look around y'all tell me I'm wrong
[02:45.51]Ain't the whole wide world just one big country song
[02:52.94]It's just one big country song
[02:56.84]Yeah we all live in one big country song
[03:04.09]Yeah it's just one big country song
data.trans:
[ti:One Big Country Song]
[ar:Locash]
[al:Brothers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.12]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:16.42]人生就像自动点唱机 只管按下播放键
[00:19.60]并非每个人的第一句听起来都一样
[00:22.30]但我们都会出生 我们都会长大
[00:25.28]不管是在某个穷乡僻壤或是玛丽安德尔湾
[00:28.11]每个人十六岁的时候都会变得疯狂
[00:30.99]在大街上慢悠悠地享受欢乐时光
[00:33.78]每个人的蓝色牛仔裤上都有洞
[00:36.90]不管你是不是买回来就那样
[00:39.44]音乐开大 一起唱
[00:42.36]我们都工作到天黑时
[00:45.43]我们都在五点左右下班
[00:48.29]周五晚上 因为一个吻 就坠入爱河
[00:51.46]我们都曾心碎过
[00:54.04]我们都曾待到酒吧关门打烊的时候
[00:57.02]环顾四周 你们都说我错了
[01:00.13]这大大的世界 不就像一首美妙的乡村歌曲吗
[01:07.64]就是一首美妙的乡村歌曲
[01:14.28]谁想在天热的时候
[01:16.44]找点水来解暑呢
[01:17.66]不管是在码头边 小河里 抑或是在大海上
[01:20.63]谁没有一只
[01:21.70]视同手足的狗狗呢 我就有
[01:23.37]谁没有尝过比母亲做的
[01:24.74]更美味的饭菜呢 反正我没有
[01:26.59]谁没有故事呢
[01:29.62]谁没有经历过痛苦呢
[01:32.50]谁不爱一个人 不想一个人呢
[01:35.47]如果你不高兴 就找个人一起歌唱
[01:38.06]音乐开大 一起唱
[01:40.84]我们都工作到天黑时
[01:43.93]我们都在五点左右下班
[01:46.77]周五晚上 因为一个吻 就坠入爱河
[01:50.07]我们都曾心碎过
[01:52.54]我们都曾待到酒吧关门打烊的时候
[01:55.52]环顾四周 你们都说我错了
[01:58.81]这大大的世界 不就像一首美妙的乡村歌曲吗
[02:05.58]它就是一首美妙的乡村歌曲
[02:13.57]并非每个人都记得《Mama Tried》的歌词
[02:19.32]城里男孩 乡下男孩 我们都只是想好好生活
[02:23.67]所以 放声高歌吧
[02:24.83]音乐开大 一起唱
[02:27.76]我们都工作到天黑时
[02:30.73]我们都在五点左右下班
[02:33.60]周五晚上 因为一个吻 就坠入爱河
[02:36.80]我们都曾心碎过
[02:39.36]我们都曾待到酒吧关门打烊的时候
[02:42.30]环顾四周 你们都说我错了
[02:45.51]这大大的世界 不就像一首美妙的乡村歌曲吗
[02:52.94]它就是一首美妙的乡村歌曲
[02:56.84]我们都活在一首美妙的乡村歌曲里
[03:04.09]它就是一首美妙的乡村歌曲
